    Site Setup settings

    here are you will be able to setup site settings:

    • General
    • Captcha
    • Features
    • Language
    Basic Setting

    The site name and description are important elements that will be used in multiple places
    throughout the frontend pages, in emails, and other places in the website.

    Site Name: This name will be used in various places in the frontend
    pages, emails, and other locations on the website.

    Site Description: This description will be used in the hero section of
    the frontend page, in emails, and other places in the website to provide a summary of
    what the site is about.

    Seo Settings

    These setting is used in the head of the frontend pages for SEO meta tags

    Social Setting

    These settings are used in the head of the frontend pages, that will be used
    when someone shares your site's link in social media sites.

    Logo and Favicon

    Logo: this image is used in navbar of the site, emails, and others, you can use Canva to create custom one
    or hire one from Fiverr.com

    Favicon: this image will be appeared in the browser tab.
    you can generate on from Favicon Generator

    In this section, we will set up our site captcha. We provide three types of captcha for more security.

    First Step

    choose if you want to enable captcha on the login and register process.

    choose your default captcha to be used.

    google captcha.

    go to google captcha console

    1. click on the (+) icon.
    2. Fill the fields
    3. check captcha v2
    4. submit Send
    5. you will redirect to APIs keys
    6. copy captcha them to the google captcha setting in the admin setting for google Recaptcha
    Hcaptcha Setup.

    go to Hcaptcha site.

    1. Create a new account,
    2. from your dashboard, click on  sites  at the head of the site.
    3. Click on  New Site .
    4. Fill hostnames field.
    5. submit  Add new domain .
    6. Then  Save .
    7. You will be redirected to your site's list.
    8. click on  Setting  beside your site.
    9. copy the captcha public key to your setting
    10. Click on the image at the top of the site, and click on settings.
    11. copy your private key to your setting in the Hcaptcha setting.

    In this section, you have control over some of the site features.

    1. the global Site currency.
    2. Give the currency thumb.
    3. Enable the Registration process.
    4. Enable Force Https Request: to make your site more secure.
    5. Enable Email verification, To require the user to verify their email before login into the dashboard.
    6. Enable Email Notification system: It will send users notifications via email about some events on the site like approve payment or withdrawal and so on.

    The last two require setup before enabling them consider reading their setup sections.

    1. Enable force strong password: This forces users to use a strong password for registrations 2 letters, 2 specific characters, and at least 8 characters.

    Number 1: to create new language as will be shown below
    Number 2: to change the language value as will be shown below
    Number 3: to change the language name and icon
    Number 4: to delete the language from the list

    All you need to write the language name, for ex: English
    next select the language icon and country,

    you can search for specific language key and click enter then update its value
    depends on the language your choice.
    for ex: translate Arabic
    Login : "تسجيل الدخول"

    In the end: for change the language status, is it visible or not
    and is it RTL status
    you can use the medium buttons "ON" and "Off"
